value.html: Soient \(a,b,c\) les racines de \(X^3 + pX + q\), \(q \ne 0\). Calculer : \(\sum_{\sigma \in S_3} \left( \frac {\sigma(a)}{\sigma(b)} + \frac {\sigma(b)}{\sigma(c)} + \frac {\sigma(c)}{\sigma(a)} \right)\).

value.latex:
$3\Bigl(\frac ab + \frac ac + \frac ba + \frac bc + \frac ca
          + \frac cb\big) = -9$.
value.html: \(3\Bigl(\frac ab + \frac ac + \frac ba + \frac bc + \frac ca + \frac cb\big) = -9\).

preview: Soient \(a,b,c\) les racines de \(X^3 + pX + q\), ...
